title: World Map
text:
This dashboard provides in-depth analysis of political advertising across 1 countries worldwide. Click on any country to explore detailed targeting strategies, demographic breakdowns, and spending patterns.

Click on any country on the map to open its detailed dashboard. Each country dashboard includes:

Value boxes with key statistics
Interactive charts with detailed tooltips
Multiple analysis pages covering different aspects
Filtering and search capabilities
